NBIS offers practical courses in R programming for the complete novice. It is geared towards life scientists and are suitable for researchers in all aspects of life sciences.

Current courses

October 2017
This course organised by the Research School in Stem Cell Biology in collaboration with the National Bioinformatics Infrastructure Sweden (NBIS).
